trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.

Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived" /> event or <see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理 <see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived" /> 的 <see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived" /> 事件或 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Process" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously collect the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream output of a process, add your event handler to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要以异步方式收集的重定向<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>进程的输出流中，添加到事件处理程序<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived>事件。

trans-unit.source: These events are raised each time the process writes a line to the corresponding redirected stream.
trans-unit.target: 进程会将行写入相应的重定向流每次会引发这些事件。

trans-unit.source: When the redirected stream is closed, a null line is sent to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 当重定向的流已关闭时，null 行发送到事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that your event handler checks for this condition before accessing the <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 确保在访问前事件处理程序检查此条件<xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the `static` method <xref:System.String.IsNullOrEmpty%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to validate the <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A> property in your event handler.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以使用`static`方法<xref:System.String.IsNullOrEmpty%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>验证<xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A>事件处理程序中的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to perform asynchronous read operations on the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream of the **sort** command.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何执行上的重定向的异步读取的操作<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>流**排序**命令。

trans-unit.source: The **sort** command is a console application that reads and sorts text input.
trans-unit.target: **排序**命令是一个控制台应用程序，读取对文本输入进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventHandler> delegate for the `SortOutputHandler` event handler and associates the delegate with the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived> event.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventHandler>委托`SortOutputHandler`事件处理程序并将关联委托，它具有<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives text lines from the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream, formats the text, and writes the text to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序接收来自的重定向的文本行<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>流，格式文本，并将文本写入屏幕。
